trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Mozilla VPN vam poleg zakrivanja lokacije in dejavnosti brskanja nudi tudi večji nadzor nad vrstami vsebin, ki se vam prikazujejo.
trans-unit.source: Mozilla VPN gives you greater control over the types of content you see, on top of protecting your location and browsing activity.

trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Na strani z nastavitvami se lahko pomaknete na “Možnosti zasebnosti” in si ogledate vse, kar lahko naredite za izboljšanje svoje izkušnje.
trans-unit.source: Within the settings page, you can navigate to “Privacy Features” to see everything you’re able to do to enhance your experience.

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Zavračanje oglasov: zmanjša število oglasov, ki se vam prikazujejo med uporabo VPN-ja.
trans-unit.source: Ad-blocking: Reduces the number of ads you see when you’re using VPN.

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Zavračanje sledilcev: manj škodljivih domen vam bo imelo možnost slediti.
trans-unit.source: Tracker-blocking: Fewer harmful domains will be able to track you.

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Zavračanje zlonamerne programske opreme: pomaga vas ščititi pred izsiljevalskim programjem, lažnim predstavljanjem, vohunskimi programi in virusi.
trans-unit.source: Block malware: Helps protect you from ransomware, phishing, spyware, viruses, and malware.

trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Če vključite katero od teh možnosti, bo prepisala morebiten DNS po meri, če ga uporabljate. Te zaščite ne nadomestijo drugih varnostnih ukrepov – na primer, čeprav ste vključili blokiranje zlonamerne programske opreme, se izogibajte prenašanju priponk iz sumljivih e-poštnih sporočil.
trans-unit.source: If you activate these features, they’ll overwrite any custom DNS you’re using. These protections are not a substitute for taking other security precautions — for example, while blocking malware you should still avoid downloading attachments in strange emails.
